poem:
Title: Underneath Bundestag's Marbled Gaze

A wolf, sheathed in innocence,
Days into nights, woven into the scrim
of fear-cast voices. Plans borne
from hushed whispers ignite,
Germany's dream woven tapestry -

A rich banquet spread,
now hints at division, 
a bitter fruit. 

Beware, the wool-clad stranger,
howling in daylight's shadow,
His banquet sits uneaten -
In silence, the sheep they tremble.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "AfD leader ‘wolf in sheep’s clothing’, says German Social Democrats head The co-leader of the German Social Democrats (SPD), the largest party in the Bundestag, has accused the leader of the far-right Alternative für Deutschland (AfD) of being a “wolf in sheep’s clothing” as he warned that plans for mass deportation discussed at a secret meeting attended by its members had sparked fears for millions across the country. In an extraordinary parliamentary debate on “fortifying". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
